downloadTitle: Exchange 2010/2013/2016/EXO Public Folders to Office365 Pre-Migration Scripts
downloadDescription: Use this script on source before starting the public folder migration from Exchange 2010/2013/2016/EXO  to Office365
detailsSection: Use this script on source before starting the public folder migration from Exchange 2010/2013/2016/EXO  to Office365.  This Source Side Validation script scans, and reports issues found with public folder deployments at the source.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Exchange Server 2010 or Exchange Server 2013 or Exchange Server 2016 or or Exchange Server 2019 to be installed on the server where the script will be run
  • PowerShell 3.0 or later
installInstructionSection: Please refer to one of the following articles for instructions on how to use the scripts:
